config.rodback.title: Rod Back Configuration
config.rodback.mod_enabled.tooltip: Master switch to enable/disable all mod features
config.rodback.auto_retract.tooltip: Master switch for automatic fishing rod retraction
config.rodback.use_slot_switch.tooltip: Retract by switching slots instead of right-clicking (avoids durability loss, only works for main hand)
config.rodback.retract_on_ground.tooltip: Automatically retract when the fishing bobber hits the ground
config.rodback.retract_on_wall.tooltip: Automatically retract when the fishing bobber hits a wall or block
config.rodback.retract_on_water.tooltip: Automatically retract when the fishing bobber touches water
config.rodback.retract_on_entity.tooltip: Automatically retract when the fishing bobber hooks an entity
config.rodback.auto_recast.tooltip: Automatically recast the fishing rod after any auto-retract (applies to all retract conditions)
config.rodback.recast_on_manual.tooltip: Automatically recast when you manually retract the fishing rod (right-click or use key)
config.rodback.recast_on_server_remove.t: Automatically recast when the server removes the fish hook (some servers directly remove fishing bobber entities)
config.rodback.recast_delay.tooltip: Number of ticks to wait before recasting (1-20 ticks, 1 tick = ~50ms, default: 3)
config.rodback.block_manual_retract.tool: Prevent manual retraction for a specified number of ticks after auto-recast to avoid accidental immediate retraction
config.rodback.block_manual_retract_tick: How many ticks to block manual retraction after auto-recast (1-100 ticks, default: 10)
